name: LMS ISP Costing
query:
SELECT
    lms.name AS "LMS Name:Link/Lastmile Services Master:150",
    lms.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    lms.lms_feasibility_partner AS "Feasibility Partner:Data:150",
    lms.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    lms.lms_delivery_date AS "Delivery Date:Date:100",
    lms.bandwith_type AS "Bandwidth Type:Data:120",
    lms.lms_brandwith_name AS "Bandwidth Name:Data:150",

    item.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:150",
    item.item_rate AS "Item Rate:Currency:100",
    item.qty AS "Quantity:Float:80",
    item.total_amount AS "Total Amount:Currency:120"

FROM
    `tabLastmile Services Master` lms
LEFT JOIN
    `tabLMS PO Item` item ON item.parent = lms.name

WHERE
    lms.lms_stage NOT IN ("Cancelled", "Disconnected")

ORDER BY
    lms.modified DESC;
